entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
